title: Betrayed
description: “Nothing good happens after dark…”Those were the words that changed Sophie’s life forever. One night she is a normal 18 year old and the next, she is waking up in the hospital, a victim of a vampire attack. Level minded Sophie knows what she saw and accepts the impossible…vampires exist. As she dives into the world of the supernatural, she finds a friend in a vampire named Lucas and when mysterious roses start appearing, she hopes he is the sender. When she is attacked again, Daire, a most unlikely hero, comes to her rescue and she discovers abilities that she never believed possible. As she tries to come to grips with her newfound power, things with Lucas go south and when an ancient demon named Cassian shows up, she must make what seems like an impossible decision. Her only clue is to follow her heart. One of the gorgeous vampires in her life is a liar…but which one is it?This is young adult paranormal romance. It contains some violence and kissing. This novel is approximately 45,000 words.
author: Lauree Waldrop
